attributes.action: Change the name of Kensington Palace Gardens to Heroes of Ukraine Gardens
attributes.additional_details: In light of the unjustified war by Russia in Ukraine, we can show we stand with the heroes of Ukraine by renaming the street next to the Russian Embassy in London.
attributes.background: Change the name of Kensington Palace Gardens to Heroes of Ukraine Gardens in London.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local road names are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.
